template.name: Antminer S9i
template.description:
Just put "S9i.info.sh" file to the Zabbix ExternalScripts directory (/etc/zabbix/externalscripts by default). Required utilites: nc, timeout, time. only bash, no perl, no python and no etc
If you like my work, please consider donating: BTC: 39DyYL4NxvBv1BTR7RK9UJJisqhTCQhFFa Dmitry Dvinskikh <dima@tevirp.ru>

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 Pool N {#POOL} is not Alive
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER ACN N {#ACN} has problem with cipsets

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER has no data
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER response is not successful

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER HASHRATE on N {#ACN} value is less than 10% of the ideal
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER N {#ACN} has problem with cipsets

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 POOLS BMMINER has no data
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER response is not successful

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 N {#FAN} speed less then 1000 rpm
{HOST.NAME} S9 Temperature on N {#TEMP} more then {$S9_TEMP}C

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} S9 POOLS BMMINER has no data
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER HASHRATE value is less than 10% of the ideal
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER has just been restarted
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER has no data
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER number of fans changed
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER number of miners changed
{HOST.NAME} S9 STATS BMMINER response is not successful
{HOST.NAME} S9 SUMMARY BMMINER has just been restarted
{HOST.NAME} S9 SUMMARY BMMINER has no data
{HOST.NAME} S9 SUMMARY BMMINER monitor does not work
{HOST.NAME} S9 VERSIONS BMMINER has no data
